subject: Automobile Racing
Le Mans Auto Race
lead_paragraph: Few of the world’s great motor races are as certain to be so full of car breakdowns, accidents and other upsets as the 24 Hours of Le Mans, which runs its 77th edition this weekend.
snippet: Few of the world’s great motor races are as certain to be so full of car breakdowns, accidents and other upsets as the 24 Hours of Le Mans, which runs its 77th edition this weekend.
